title: Groups of men and women seated at three long banquet tables with light colored tablecloths and signs with business names including "Goldie's Beauty Shoppe", "Hotels", and "Pittsburgh Courier", main banquet table in front of room with man wearing dark suit, light colored button down collared shirt and pocket scarf, and dark necktie, standing at podium holding microphone, in interior with striped curtains, tiled wall section with seal and clock, and American flag
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
